title: The Beekeeper
description: Sit in on an interview with Russell "Buzz" Riopelle, who has been keeping bees in Ohio for 30 years. Readers learn about the different types of bees, their roles in the hive, and how honey is made. Photographs, interesting fact boxes, and a scientific illustration support the text.
highFrequencyWords: anther, bellows, cells, congregate, extract, honeycomb, native, pistil, pollen
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
awareness: Verb Tense                : Identify and create contractions
phonics: Suffixes : Recognize and use suffixes -y and -ly
